it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.message
Class BasicMessage

java.lang.Object
  it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.message.BasicMessage
Direct Known Subclasses:
JoinMessage, PeerListMessage, PingMessage
public class BasicMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Class BasicMessage implements a basic message for peer. The field are:
-type: for the type of message (es.PING)
-timestamp: instant delivery
-payload: data structure to hold any information

Author:
Fabrizio Caramia
